document_data.name: Ulburto
document_data.alignment5e: [[Chaotic evil]]{{Cite adventurers league/Shadows over the Moonsea|31}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Ulburto''' was a man who lived in a small village on an isle near [[Phlan]] in the [[Moonsea]] region in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Activities: He ran the village's smokehouse. He knew the village's dark secret.
document_data.Personality: Ulburto was a violent and dangerous man, waiting for time when he could use violence. He was suspicious of all strangers but liked the stories of the village's crones.{{Cite adventurers league/Shadows over the Moonsea|19}}
